303745.text: After casting Night Spring, all allies' attacks ignore enemy DEF equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of Sanva's ATK, and increases Sanva's max Health by <color=#82C65D>$parameter2$%</color>; stacks up to 3 times.

303746.text: During the first 30 seconds of combat, all allies take <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> less DMG.

303747.text: Increases <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of self's ATK every 10 seconds, up to 4 times.

303749.text:
Launches 5 magic attacks on a random target, each dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of ATK and inflicting 10 seconds of Dazzled.
Dazzled: Increases Magic DMG taken by 6% and reduces ATK by an amount equal to 8% of Maja Kany's ATK; stacks up to 5 times.

303751.text:
Gives all allies a 15-second shield equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of Maja Kany's ATK and regenerates the same amount of Health. When the shield is active, Magic DMG taken decreases by 15%, and a stack of Leap is applied every 3 seconds.
Leap: Increases Magic DMG dealt by 5%; stacks up to 10 times.

303753.text: Recovers 1 Chaos Energy upon taking damage. The effect can only be triggered once in <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$</color> seconds.

303754.text: Every time High Spirited is triggered, reduces a random enemy target's Magic DEF by an amount equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of Maja Kany's ATK; lasts for 30 seconds and stacks up to 5 times.

303756.text: Summons Holy Boundary to deal Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of ATK to the enemy's middle row while imprisoning the target for 1s, after which Holy Boundary expands to deal Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter2$%</color> ATK to all enemy targets.

303758.text:
Deal Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of ATK to all enemy targets while inflicting Divine Wail for 15s.
Divine Wail: Receives 20% more DMG from Nicolis; stacks up to 2 times.

303760.text: Every use of a skill reduces a random enemy's Magic DEF equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of Nicolis's ATK; stacks up to 5 times.

303761.text: Every use of Holy Boundary has a 50% chance of increasing Magic DMG dealt by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color>; stacks up to 5 times.

303762.text: While in the Nightwish status, ATK increases by an amount equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of Tuonel's ATK.

303763.text: All allies receive a <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> DMG Taken Reduction for 10s after entering combat.

303764.text: Increases self's max Health by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> and ATK by <color=#82C65D>$parameter2$%</color> for 30s.

303765.text: Every use of Injection Time increases self's ATK by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color>; stacks up to 3 times.

303766.text: Increases self's ATK by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> every 15s; stacks up to 3 times.

303767.text: Every 30s, increases Physical DMG dealt by all allies by<color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> for 20s.

303769.text: Claire attacks a random target 5 times, each time dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of ATK. Meanwhile, Claire's ATK increases by <color=#82C65D>$parameter2$%</color> for 15s.

303771.text:
Attack all enemies 10 times, each time dealing Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of ATK. 
For each release of Bright Starlight, the DMG dealt by all skills released thereafter is increased by 2%; stacks up to 50 times.

303775.text: Naiad cuts down a single target, inflicting Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of ATK for 3 times. For the next 10s, Naiad's Crit Chance increases by 30%.

303777.text: Naiad draws her blade and makes a frontal slash, then performs an iaido attack that deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of ATK to all enemies.

303779.text: After entering combat, Crit DMG increases by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> every 5s, up to a maximum of <color=#82C65D>$parameter2$%</color>; self's ATK increases by <color=#82C65D>$parameter3$%</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#82C65D>$parameter4$%</color>.

303788.text: Strikes the enemy's front row 2 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of self's ATK.

303790.text:
Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of self's ATK and inflicts the enemy targets with 10 seconds of Timid.
Timid: Decreases the target's Physical and Magic DEF equal to <color=#82C65D>15% </color>of self's ATK for 10s.

303792.text: When dealing damage, inflicts extra Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of self's ATK.

303793.text: After combat starts, ATK increases by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> every 5s, stacks up to 15 times.

303795.text: Increases self's Crit Chance by 30% for 10s and attacks the enemies in the back row twice, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of self's ATK.

303797.text: Hits all enemy targets with 2 attacks, each dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of self's ATK. For the next 5s, DMG dealt increases by 20%.

303802.text: Increases the DMG taken of all enemies by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> for 10s, and restores 1 Chaos Energy.

303804.text: Restores 1 Order Energy, and heals all allies for <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of self's ATK.

303806.text: When using skills, there is a <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> chance to restore 1 Chaos Energy.

303807.text: Increases DMG Dealt of all allies by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color>.

303809.text: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of self's ATK to a single enemy target, and increases self's ATK by 15% for 10 seconds

303811.text: Every 1.5 seconds, deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of self's ATK to all enemy targets for unlimited time. Every additional use of Lava Explosion increases the damage of the skill by 15% for 15 seconds; stacks up to 5 times

303813.text: Increases damage dealt by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> for every 10% Health lost.

303814.text: The Damage Factor of Lava Explosion increases by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color>

303816.text: Increases all DMG Dealt by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> for 5 seconds

303818.text: Deals Physical DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of self's ATK to all enemy targets

303820.text: After entering combat, Crit Chance increases by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> every 5 seconds, by up to a maximum of <color=#82C65D>$parameter2$%</color>

303821.text: Every Crit landed reduces the enemy's Physical DEF by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color>; stacks up to 5 times

303823.text: Provides the lowest-Health ally with a 10-second shield equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of Auris's max Health. When the shield is active, the target gains Magic DEF equal to 10% of Auris's max Health

303825.text: Deals Magic DMG equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of Auris's max Health to all enemy targets while inflicting 2 seconds of Stun

303827.text: Every 10% of max Health lost increases self's Magic DEF by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color>

303828.text: All allies take <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> less damage for 60s after entering combat.

303830.text: Heals the Doll with the lowest Health for <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of Gracin's ATK

303832.text: Cleanses all allies of debuffs. For the next 10s, every time an ally deals DMG, Crit Chance increases by <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color>, up to <color=#82C65D>$parameter2$%</color>

303834.text: Heals the Doll with the lowest Health for <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of Gracin's ATK every 5 seconds.

303835.text: Every time an allied Doll is healed, ATK increases by an amount equal to <color=#82C65D>$parameter1$%</color> of Gracin's ATK for the next 10s.
